private  boolean readPKCS1format(java.lang.String filename)
          This method is used to read the keys generated by the application, this is the standard way of using private keys in jglobus.
private  boolean readPKCS8format(java.lang.String filename)
          This method is broken and does not work with any of the PKCS8-format keys I've tried to read.
